price: 14. ir žemė bei kalnai bus pakelti ir sutrinti vienu smūgiu (t. y. mostu),
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
